name: Nascar Web Racing
summary: Nascar Web Racing the only free NASCAR-licensed racing game on the Web. Produced by Electronic Arts online division, EA Sports Nascar Web Racing allows players to choose real NASCAR Nextel Cup Series drivers, such as Dale Earnhardt, Jr. and Jimmie Johnson; official stock cars; real NASCAR tracks (Bristol Motor Speedway, Atlanta Motor Speedway, Infineon Raceway); and real NASCAR elements, such as drafting, passing and pit stops.
